titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the From Saigon to sanctuary [videorecording (DVD)] : a history of the Vietnamese resettlement in West Michigan / Grand Rapids Historical Commission ; West Michigan Vietnamese History Committee ; written and edited by Huan Le, Frank R. Jamison, Paula W. Jamison ; produced and directed by Frank R. Jamison and Huan Le.
titlestmt.sponsor: Funding assistance provided by the Michigan Humanities Council, Grand Rapids Foundation, Steelcase Foundation, Frey Foundation, Meijer Inc., and the Grand Rapids Public Library.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: From Saigon to sanctuary [videorecording (DVD)] : a history of the Vietnamese resettlement in West Michigan / Grand Rapids Historical Commission ; West Michigan Vietnamese History Committee ; written and edited by Huan Le, Frank R. Jamison, Paula W. Jamison ; produced and directed by Frank R. Jamison and Huan Le.
did.langmaterial: Two separate presentations one in English and one in Vietnamese.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Grand Rapids, MI : Grand Rapids Historical Commission, c2006.

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Subtitle on disc: Story of Vietnamese refugees in West Michigan

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Narrators: Frank R. Jamison (English) and Do Van Khanh (Vietnamese) ; featuring Gerald R. Ford and Rev. Howard D. Schipper.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: History and heritage -- First wave refguees -- Boat people -- Orderly departure program -- Resettlement in West Michigan -- Legacy of war.

archdesc.scopecontent: "A documentary project of the Grand Rapids Historical Commission and the West Michigan Vietnamese History Committee."--Disc.
